SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: Oh sorry, something went wrong with current action!
USER_PROVIDER_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred with the user provider.
EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: There is already a user with that email.
NOT_VALID_SEARCH: The search is invalid, you must send the name of a city, or a geolocation point with lat, lng and radio.
NON_CONFIGURED_PROVIDER: The provider {{providerName}} has not been configured. It requires {{params}}.
